name: discord-server-status
description: Post game server status updates to Discord including online/offline notifications and player count changes.
author: Sentinel Team

webhookUrl.description: Discord webhook URL for server status notifications

notifyOnConnect.description: Send notification when server comes online

notifyOnDisconnect.description: Send notification when server goes offline

notifyOnPlayerCountChange.description: Send notification when player count changes

playerCountThreshold.description: Minimum player count change to trigger notification (0 = every change)

onlineColor.description: Embed color for online status (decimal, default: green 0x57F287)

offlineColor.description: Embed color for offline status (decimal, default: red 0xED4245)

updateColor.description: Embed color for update notifications (decimal, default: blue 0x5865F2)

showServerAddress.description: Include server address and port in notifications

showMap.description: Include current map name in notifications
